description.label: Description
description.value: The creature is wreathed with Tzeentch’s fire that frequently flies forth from fingertips, mouths, or burning eyes. All creatures of the same type (e.g. all Pink Horrors, or all Blue Horrors) in the vicinity pool their power. One Horror is chosen to be the focus (caster), and may cast 1 Tzeentch Spell: Pink Horrors cast the @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-eis.items.sklbZU3K8ogeu3mC]{Pink Fire of Tzeentch} Spell; other creatures cast the @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-eis.items.wY6JAt76eArBroYC]{Blue Fire of Tzeentch} Spell. Each additional contributing creature adds +1 SL, to a maximum of +9 SL, as a Free Action.
